question: Uretse mu mijyi, kuyindi mihanda yagenywe na minisiteri ushinzwe gutwara ibintu  n'abantu, uburemere ntarengwa bwemewe ku binyabiziga bifatanye bifite imitambiko  itatu ni:

options: Umuyobozi wikinyabiziga gisubira inyuma azahagarara nabona umuyobozi w'  ikinyabimitende ibiri
Umuyobozi w' ikinyamitende ashobora guhagarara bitunguranye
Umuyobozi w' ikinyamitende ibiri ashobora gusaba umuyobozi w' ikinyabiziga  gisubira inyuma guhagarara
Amatara yo guhagarara ashobora kuzima ikinyabiziga gikomeza gusubira  inyuma
question: Niki umuyobozi w' ikinyabiziga akwiriye kumenya mugihe akurikiye umuyobozi  wikinyamitende ibiri kandi imodoka y' umweru iri gusubira inyuma ijya mu muhanda?

options: Biragoye kubona neza mu muhanda munini
question: Muri iri sangano ry'umuhanda hari icyapa gisobanura guhagararan'umurongo  wera urombereje munzira . Niyihe mpamvu hari iki cyapa cyo guhagarara hano?
Uburyo bukoreshwa kugirango ikinyabiziga kigende gahoro igihe feri idakora neza  babwita:

options: Asabwa gusiga kwegera iburyo agatanga inzira
Asabwa gusiga kwegera ibumoso agatanga inzira
question: Igihe bigaragaye ko hari ikinyabiziga gishaka kunyuranaho kiri inyuma, umuyobozi  akora iki?
Mu byapa bikurikira , ni ikihe cyerekana umuhanda udakomeza
Mu gihe telefone yawe ihamagawe utwaye imodoka wakora iki?
Iki cyapa gisobanura iki ?

options: Icyapa cyera cya mpande enye zingana zifite uruhande rwa metero 0.30  n'uruzitiro ruri ku mpera y'iburyo
Icyapa cyera cya mpande enye zingana zifite uruhande rwa metero 0.30
question: Igihe ikorwa ry'imirimo ribangamiye cyane cyangwa buke uburyo bwo kugenda mu  nzira nyabagendwa, ahakorerwa imirimo hagaragazwa ku buryo bukurikira:

options: Ibinyabiziga biri muri A na B
Ibinyabiziga biri muri C na D
Ibinyabiziga biri muri E na F
question: Umuyobozi w'imyaka 18 ashobora kuyobora:
Abagendera mu nzira nyabagendwa babujijwe kwata iki?

options: Gisobanura ko hari bariyeri ya gisirakare
question: Iki cyapa gisobanuye iki?
Icyapa cyerekana umuvuduko ntarengwa ikinyabiziga kitagomba kurenza gishyirwa ku  binyabiziga bifite uburebure ntarengwa bukurikira:

options: ibyo byapa bishyirwaho hakurikijwe intera ibitandukanya
mu gice cy'inzira nyabagendwa kiri hagati yaho bishinze n'inkomane ikurikiyeho  ku ruhande rw'inzira bishinzeho
question: Ibyapa bibuza n'ibitegeka bikurikizwa gusa aha hakurikira:

options: itara ribonesha icyapa kiranga numero y'ikinyabiziga inyuma
question: Iyo ikinyabiziga gifite amatara abiri cyangwa menshi y'ubwoko bumwe ayo matara  agomba kugira ibara rimwe n'ingufu zingana kandi akagomba gushyirwaho ku buryo  buteganye uhereye ku murongo ugabanya ikinyabizigamo kabiri mu burebure bwacyo.  Ariko ibi ntibikurikizwa ku matara akurikira:
iki cyapa gisobanura iki ?

options: gukuramo umukandara wo kwirinda ibyago wambaye mukawambara mwembi
kubyerengagiza wizeyeko nta mpanuka muri bukore
funga cyane umukandara wo kwirinda ibyago wawe
Kubibutsa kwambara umukandara wo kwirinda ibyago
question: Igihe utwaye umuntu mu kinyabiziga cyawe, akibagirwa kwambara umukandara wo  kwirinda ibyago ugomba:
Iki cyapa gisobanura iki:

options: gukacira feri bidatewe no kwirinda ibyago
kugabanya umuvuduko kuburyo budasanzwe no gukacira feri bidatewe no  kwirinda ibyago
question: Birabujijwe kubangamira imigendere isanzwe y'ibindi binyabiziga kubera ibi bikurikira:
Muri ibi binyabiziga n'ikihe gihagaze nabi?
